sentences.en: "Why didn't you appoint Ron twelve months ago?"—"Good question."
sentences.cn: “你为什么12个月前不任命罗恩呢？”——“问得好。”

sentences.en: A few years ago jogging was the in thing.
A few years ago they toured the country in a roadshow.
sentences.cn: 几年前他们在全国作了巡回演出。

sentences.en: Breakfast television arrived in British life precisely a decade ago.
sentences.cn: 准确地说，早间电视节目于10年前进入英国人的生活。

sentences.en: Len tied the knot with Kate five years ago.
sentences.cn: 莱恩5年前和凯特结婚了。

sentences.en: Mechanization happened years ago on the farms of Islay.
sentences.cn: 数年前，艾莱的农场就实现了机械化。

sentences.en: Once, years ago, he told me our lives should entwine.
sentences.cn: 多年前，他曾经对我说我们应该生活在一起。

sentences.en: Rationing had put an end to a surfeit of biscuits long ago.
sentences.cn: 定量供应很久以前就结束了饼干过剩的状况。

sentences.en: The London Evening Standard moved offices a few years ago.
sentences.cn: 《伦敦标准晚报》报址几年前迁走了。

sentences.en: The night shift should have been safely down the mine long ago.
sentences.cn: 上夜班的矿工应该早就安全地到达井下了。

sentences.en: The satellite had been inactive since its launch two years ago.
sentences.cn: 该卫星自从两年前发射以来一直没起作用。

sentences.en: The stars must have formed 10 to 15 billion years ago.
sentences.cn: 这些恒星一定是形成于100到150亿年前。

sentences.en: Their water was turned off weeks ago without explanation.
sentences.cn: 他们的水在几周以前就毫无理由地被切断了。

sentences.en: These developments were foreseen in embryo more than a decade ago.
sentences.cn: 这些发展早在十多年前的萌芽阶段就已预见到。

sentences.en: They moved to a new house some time ago (=  a fairly long time ago  ) .
sentences.cn: 他们搬进新居已有些日子了。

sentences.en: This put me in mind of some-thing Patrick said many years ago.
sentences.cn: 这使我想起多年前帕特里克曾说过的话。

sentences.en: We had our bicentenary celebrations not that long ago.
sentences.cn: 不久前，我们举行了200周年庆典活动。

trans.tran_en: used to show how far back in the past something happened
used to show how far back in the past something happened
